word: H8173 - שָׁעַע - shâʻaʻ - shaw-ah' - Cry - கூப்பிடு

sections.paragraph: வினைச்சொல் - கூப்பிடு, மன மகிழ்ச்சியாயிரு, விளையாடு, தேற்று, தாலாட்டு, மூடிப்போடு
1) to stroke, to be smeared over, to be blinded
1) to be smeared over, to be blinded
b) (Hiphil) to besmear (used of eyes), to smear over eyes
c) (Hithpalpel) to blind oneself, to be blinded
2) to sport, to take delight in
a) (Pilpel) to sport, to delight in, to take delight in, to delight oneself

ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: A primitive root; (in a good acceptation) to look upon (with complacency), that is, fondle, please or amuse (self); (in a bad one) to look about (in dismay), that is, stare. (cry out is by confusion with H7768.): - cry (out) [by confusion with H7768], dandle, delight (self), play, shut.
Cognate: H8173, H8174, H8191
